title: Ticket #657: Interactive running of test suite on windows opens lots of windows
description: Running the test suite on windows interactively opens up lots of short lived windows. These take keyboard focus for an instant and cause missed keystrokes in other windows. This makes the machine unusable in an interactive context.
remarks:
